front.div:
Abstract:
This deliverable presents the characteristics and implementation of the multi-user multi-cell cooperation
prototype developed in activity 6A3. The aim of this prototype is to demonstrate within the scope of
ROCKET, the implementation feasibility of a cooperation algorithm that allows mobiles near the cell or
sector edge to share time-frequency resources with minimal interference. For this activity, propagation
scenarios and channel models are used from the ROCKET system characterization in WP1 while the
cooperation algorithm has been studied in detail in WP3.
In this deliverable, after a brief overview of the usage scenario, the overall prototype composition and the
algorithm selected for implementation, a detailed description of the demonstrator is provided. Then, the
implementation of the algorithm in each component and nodes of the test-bed including their interactions
and the development of novel hardware processing, implementation and integration techniques is
described. The evaluation and validation of the employed algorithm is obtained through specific system
configurations carried out on the hardware platform and consolidated by measurements that demonstrate
the efficacy of the proposed ROCKET technique.
